verses.verse: Of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to <S%H5015>Nebo!<s%> for it is laid <S%H7703>waste;<s%> <S%H7156>Kiriathaim<s%> is <S%H3001>disappointed,<s%> it is <S%H3920>taken;<s%> <S%H4869>Misgab<s%> is put to <S%H3001>shame<s%> and broken <S%H2865>down.<s%>

The <S%H8416>praise<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is no <S%H2809>more;<s%> in Heshbon they have <S%H2803>devised<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> against <S%H3212>her:<s%> Come, and let us cut her <S%H3772>off<s%> from being a <S%H1471>nation.<s%> You <S%H4086>also,<s%> Madmen, shall be <S%H1826>brought<s%> to <S%H2719>silence:<s%> the sword shall <S%H3212>pursue<s%> <S%H310>you.<s%>
The <S%H6963>sound<s%> of a <S%H6963>cry<s%> from <S%H2773>Horonaim,<s%> <S%H7701>desolation<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7701>destruction!<s%>
<S%H4124>Moab<s%> is <S%H7665>destroyed;<s%> her little <S%H6810>ones<s%> have caused a <S%H2201>cry<s%> to be <S%H8085>heard.<s%>

For by the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of <S%H3872>Luhith<s%> with <S%H1065>continual<s%> <S%H1065>weeping<s%> shall they go <S%H5927>up;<s%> for at the <S%H4174>descent<s%> of <S%H2773>Horonaim<s%> <S%H6862>they<s%> have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the distress of the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of <S%H7667>destruction.<s%>
<S%H5127>Flee,<s%> <S%H4422>save<s%> your <S%H5315>lives,<s%> and <S%H1961>be<s%> like the <S%H6176>heath<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

<S%H982>For,<s%> because you have trusted in your <S%H4639>works<s%> and in your <S%H214>treasures,<s%> you also shall be <S%H3920>taken:<s%> and <S%H3645>Chemosh<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> his <S%H3548>priests<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

The <S%H7703>destroyer<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> on every <S%H5892>city,<s%> and no <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H4422>escape;<s%> the <S%H6010>valley<s%> also shall <S%H6>perish,<s%> and the <S%H4334>plain<s%> shall be <S%H8045>destroyed;<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H559>spoken.<s%>

<S%H5414>Give<s%> <S%H6731>wings<s%> to <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> that she may <S%H5323>fly<s%> and get her <S%H3318>away:<s%> and her <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall become a <S%H8047>desolation,<s%> without any to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H2004>therein.<s%>

<S%H779>Cursed<s%> is he who <S%H6213>does<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7423>negligently;<s%> and <S%H779>cursed<s%> is he who keeps <S%H4513>back<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%> from <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

<S%H4124>Moab<s%> has been at <S%H7599>ease<s%> from his <S%H5271>youth,<s%> and he has <S%H8252>settled<s%> on his <S%H8105>lees,<s%> and has not been <S%H7324>emptied<s%> from <S%H3627>vessel<s%> to <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> neither has he <S%H1980>gone<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity:<s%> therefore his <S%H2940>taste<s%> <S%H5975>remains<s%> in <S%H7381>him,<s%> and his scent is not <S%H4171>changed.<s%>

<S%H3117>Therefore,<s%> behold, the days <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that I will <S%H7971>send<s%> to him those who <S%H6808>pour<s%> <S%H6808>off,<s%> and they shall pour him <S%H7324>off;<s%> and they shall empty his <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and <S%H5310>break<s%> their bottles in <S%H5035>pieces.<s%>
<S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of <S%H3645>Chemosh,<s%> as the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> their <S%H4009>confidence.<s%>
How do you <S%H559>say,<s%> We are <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H2428>men,<s%> and valiant <S%H582>men<s%> for the <S%H4421>war?<s%>

<S%H4124>Moab<s%> is laid <S%H7703>waste,<s%> and they are gone <S%H5927>up<s%> into his <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and his <S%H4005>chosen<s%> young <S%H970>men<s%> are gone <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H2874>slaughter,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H4428>King,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>
The <S%H343>calamity<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H935>come,<s%> and his <S%H7451>affliction<s%> <S%H4116>hurries<s%> <S%H3966>fast.<s%>

All you who are <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H5110>him,<s%> bemoan <S%H3045>him,<s%> and all you who know his <S%H8034>name;<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> How is the <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4294>staff<s%> <S%H7665>broken,<s%> the <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H4731>rod!<s%>

You <S%H1323>daughter<s%> who <S%H3427>dwells<s%> in <S%H1769>Dibon,<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%> from your <S%H3519>glory,<s%> and <S%H3427>sit<s%> in <S%H6772>thirst;<s%> for the <S%H7703>destroyer<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> has <S%H5927>come<s%> up against <S%H7843>you,<s%> he has destroyed your <S%H4013>strongholds.<s%>

<S%H3427>Inhabitant<s%> of <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H6822>watch:<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> him who <S%H5127>flees,<s%> and her who <S%H4422>escapes;<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> What has been <S%H1961>done?<s%>

<S%H4124>Moab<s%> is <S%H3001>disappointed;<s%> for it is broken <S%H2865>down:<s%> <S%H3213>wail<s%> and <S%H2199>cry;<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> it by the <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> that <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is laid <S%H7703>waste.<s%>
<S%H4941>Judgment<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> on the <S%H4334>plain<s%> <S%H776>country,<s%> on <S%H2473>Holon,<s%> and on <S%H3096>Jahzah,<s%> and on <S%H4158>Mephaath,<s%>
and on <S%H1769>Dibon,<s%> and on <S%H5015>Nebo,<s%> and on Beth <S%H1015>Diblathaim,<s%>
and on <S%H7156>Kiriathaim,<s%> and on Beth <S%H1014>Gamul,<s%> and on Beth <S%H1010>Meon,<s%>
and on <S%H7152>Kerioth,<s%> and on <S%H1224>Bozrah,<s%> and on all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> or <S%H7138>near.<s%>
The <S%H7161>horn<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is cut <S%H1438>off,<s%> and his <S%H2220>arm<s%> is <S%H7665>broken,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Make him <S%H7937>drunken;<s%> for he <S%H1431>magnified<s%> himself against <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> and <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall <S%H5606>wallow<s%> in his <S%H6892>vomit,<s%> and he also shall be in <S%H7814>derision.<s%>

For <S%H3478>wasn't<s%> Israel a <S%H7814>derision<s%> to <S%H4672>you?<s%> was he found among <S%H1590>thieves?<s%> for as <S%H1767>often<s%> as you <S%H1697>speak<s%> of <S%H5110>him,<s%> you shake your head.

You <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H5800>leave<s%> the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H5553>rock;<s%> and be like the <S%H3123>dove<s%> that makes her <S%H7077>nest<s%> <S%H5676>over<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H6354>abyss.<s%>

We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%> He is <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1343>proud;<s%> his <S%H1363>loftiness,<s%> and his <S%H1347>pride,<s%> and his <S%H1346>arrogance,<s%> and the <S%H7312>haughtiness<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
I <S%H3045>know<s%> his <S%H5678>wrath,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that it is <S%H907>nothing;<s%> his boastings have worked <S%H6213>nothing.<s%>
Therefore will I <S%H3213>wail<s%> for <S%H4124>Moab;<s%> <S%H2199>yes,<s%> I will cry out for all <S%H4124>Moab:<s%> for the <S%H582>men<s%> of Kir <S%H7025>Heres<s%> shall they <S%H1897>mourn.<s%>

With more than the <S%H1065>weeping<s%> of <S%H3270>Jazer<s%> will I <S%H1058>weep<s%> for <S%H1612>you,<s%> vine of <S%H7643>Sibmah:<s%> your <S%H5189>branches<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> they <S%H5060>reached<s%> even to the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of <S%H3270>Jazer:<s%> on your summer <S%H7019>fruits<s%> and on your <S%H1210>vintage<s%> the <S%H7703>destroyer<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen.<s%>

<S%H1524>Gladness<s%> and <S%H8057>joy<s%> is <S%H622>taken<s%> away from the fruitful <S%H3759>field<s%> and from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab;<s%> and I have caused <S%H3196>wine<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from the wine <S%H3342>presses:<s%> none shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> with <S%H1959>shouting;<s%> the <S%H1959>shouting<s%> shall be no <S%H1959>shouting.<s%>

From the <S%H2201>cry<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> even to <S%H500>Elealeh,<s%> even to <S%H3096>Jahaz<s%> have they <S%H5414>uttered<s%> their <S%H6963>voice,<s%> from <S%H6820>Zoar<s%> even to <S%H2773>Horonaim,<s%> to <S%H5697>Eglath<s%> <S%H7992>Shelishiyah:<s%> for the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5249>Nimrim<s%> also shall become <S%H4923>desolate.<s%>

Moreover I will cause to <S%H7673>cease<s%> in <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> him who <S%H5927>offers<s%> in the high <S%H1116>place,<s%> and him who burns <S%H6999>incense<s%> to his <S%H430>gods.<s%>

Therefore my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1993>sounds<s%> for <S%H4124>Moab<s%> like <S%H2485>pipes,<s%> and my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1993>sounds<s%> like <S%H2485>pipes<s%> for the <S%H582>men<s%> of Kir <S%H7025>Heres:<s%> therefore the <S%H3502>abundance<s%> that he has <S%H6213>gotten<s%> is <S%H6>perished.<s%>

For every <S%H7218>head<s%> is <S%H7144>bald,<s%> and every <S%H2206>beard<s%> <S%H1639>clipped:<s%> on all the <S%H3027>hands<s%> are <S%H1417>cuttings,<s%> and on the <S%H4975>waist<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth.<s%>

On all the <S%H1406>housetops<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and in its <S%H7339>streets<s%> there is <S%H4553>lamentation<s%> every <S%H7665>where;<s%> for I have broken <S%H4124>Moab<s%> like a <S%H3627>vessel<s%> in which none <S%H2656>delights,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

How it is broken <S%H2865>down!<s%> How they <S%H3213>wail!<s%> How <S%H4124>Moab<s%> has <S%H6437>turned<s%> the <S%H6203>back<s%> with <S%H954>shame!<s%> So shall <S%H4124>Moab<s%> become a <S%H7814>derision<s%> and a <S%H4288>terror<s%> to all who are around <S%H5439>him.<s%>
For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H1675>Behold,<s%> he shall fly as an <S%H5404>eagle,<s%> and shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> out his <S%H3671>wings<s%> against <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>

<S%H7152>Kerioth<s%> is <S%H3920>taken,<s%> and the <S%H4679>strongholds<s%> are <S%H3920>seized,<s%> and the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> at that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be as the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%> in her <S%H6887>pangs.<s%>
<S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> from being a <S%H5971>people,<s%> because he has <S%H1431>magnified<s%> himself against <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H6343>Fear,<s%> and the <S%H6354>pit,<s%> and the <S%H6341>snare,<s%> are on <S%H3427>you,<s%> inhabitant of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

He who <S%H5127>flees<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H6343>fear<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> into the <S%H6354>pit;<s%> and he who gets <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H6354>pit<s%> shall be <S%H3920>taken<s%> in the <S%H6341>snare:<s%> for I will <S%H935>bring<s%> on <S%H4124>him,<s%> even on Moab, the <S%H8141>year<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Those who <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> without <S%H3581>strength<s%> under the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon;<s%> for a <S%H784>fire<s%> is gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and a <S%H3852>flame<s%> from the <S%H996>midst<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon,<s%> and has <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H6285>corner<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and the crown of the <S%H6936>head<s%> of the <S%H7588>tumultuous<s%> <S%H1121>ones.<s%>

<S%H188>Woe<s%> to <S%H4124>you,<s%> O Moab! the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3645>Chemosh<s%> is <S%H6>undone;<s%> for your <S%H1121>sons<s%> are <S%H3947>taken<s%> away <S%H7628>captive,<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> into <S%H7633>captivity.<s%>

Yet will I bring <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> Thus <S%H2008>far<s%> is the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>
